item.title: Sleeping Beauty (Redo)
item.media:title: Sleeping Beauty (Redo)
item.media:description:
I redid the Sleeping Beauty pic because I wanted a more bolder colors. The other one was too light and I felt it didn’t show too much depth. Plus, for these and maybe for all of my other works…I want to go for a more storybook/concept type art. ^^ I’ll prbly redo the butterfly pic too.

I thank you for the constructive criticism! I changed a few things, but to be honest...I just like it the way it is. :> I can see that there are a couple of people who liked the original one better and I have nothing against that. The reason I redid this picture was not only because I wanted to use a bolder palette, but because I was unhappy with the original. I'm my own worst critic and so, I redrew it and repainted it for myself.
item.description:
I redid the Sleeping Beauty pic because I wanted a more bolder colors. The other one was too light and I felt it didn’t show too much depth. Plus, for these and maybe for all of my other works…I want to go for a more storybook/concept type art. ^^ I’ll prbly redo the butterfly pic too.

I thank you for the constructive criticism! I changed a few things, but to be honest...I just like it the way it is. :> I can see that there are a couple of people who liked the original one better and I have nothing against that. The reason I redid this picture was not only because I wanted to use a bolder palette, but because I was unhappy with the original. I'm my own worst critic and so, I redrew it and repainted it for myself.

item.title: The Rose
item.media:title: The Rose
item.media:description: I did my best. This was a challenge for me...I had a hard time trying to think of a design for the beast, the beast being the female of course. Haha the more and more I started drawing her the more it started looking like the faun from Pan's Labyrinth. OTL I do have another pic of her with sort of a different design on my tumblr. The color scheme isn't all that different tho. The composition of this scene was based off of the part where Belle first meets the Beast and wishes to see his face. But, here the situation is where the beast almost kills the young man only to see that he isn't really afraid of her. She eventually offers him a rose. It was the first time in a long time a person has gotten so close to her. This is their moment.
item.description: I did my best. This was a challenge for me...I had a hard time trying to think of a design for the beast, the beast being the female of course. The color scheme isn't all that different tho. The composition of this scene was based off of the part where Belle first meets the Beast and wishes to see his face. But, here the situation is where the beast almost kills the young man only to see that he isn't really afraid of her. She eventually offers him a rose. It was the first time in a long time a person has gotten so close to her. This is their moment.

item.title: After the Battle
item.media:title: After the Battle
item.media:description:
I really wanted to do a dark rainy scene. I did one previous to this one so I can sort of get the feel of the mood. I used a few good references to get the dark mood.

eofdreams.com/photo/rain/07/

1.bp.blogspot.com/_lWVCWLbe2CI…

Here is Sleeping Beauty with his courageous knight. I need a name for both of them. orz I'm still trying to think of a good composition with her slaying the dragon...so that'll have to wait.

item.title: Blue Daze
item.media:title: Blue Daze
item.media:description:
I wanted to draw a portrait and some butterflies, but I couldn't really think of anything. But, I came across this picture on my tumblr and I came up with this.

nocting-whatever.tumblr.com/po…

I used it as reference for the butterflies because I don't draw butterflies a lot. Just wanted to draw something serene in this hot weather.

item.title: Thor and Loki: The IPhone
item.media:title: Thor and Loki: The IPhone
item.media:description: I did this looong time ago. After I watched the Avengers...I couldn't help, but think of this scenario. Loki gets an IPhone or any other smart phones out there, doesn't necessarily have to be an IPhone....
item.description: I did this looong time ago. After I watched the Avengers...I couldn't help, but think of this scenario. Loki gets an IPhone or any other smart phones out there, doesn't necessarily have to be an IPhone....

item.title: Doodles
item.media:title: Doodles
item.media:description: Thank you so much for all the birthday wishes guys!!! You guys really made my day!!!! So, I thought I'd draw something fun for you ^^ Fun little random doodles! Enjoy!
item.description: Thank you so much for all the birthday wishes guys!!! You guys really made my day!!!! So, I thought I'd draw something fun for you ^^ Fun little random doodles! Enjoy!

item.title: FanFiction
item.media:title: FanFiction
item.media:description: I did my best OTL. So here is the long awaited FanFiction! I read your suggestions...I didn't expect so many comments I totally forgot about the whole poll feature thing you could do on DA, so that was my bad. I thought it would be good to represent both genders in the FF.net community, so in the end I agreed with the twins idea. And I made their clothing more simple and casual. Not very cyber-tech like all my other personifications, except for the headphones, because I love headphones on people. They're both carrying our most favorite thing!!! A laptop! I thank you for the comments guys! And I also thank you for the 20k + watchers!!!! ;v; I shall keep doing my best to improve on my skills!
item.description: I did my best OTL. So here is the long awaited FanFiction! I read your suggestions...I didn't expect so many comments I totally forgot about the whole poll feature thing you could do on DA, so that was my bad. I thought it would be good to represent both genders in the FF.net community, so in the end I agreed with the twins idea. And I made their clothing more simple and casual. Not very cyber-tech like all my other personifications, except for the headphones, because I love headphones on people. They're both carrying our most favorite thing!!! A laptop! I thank you for the comments guys! And I also thank you for the 20k + watchers!!!! ;v; I shall keep doing my best to improve on my skills!

item.title: Sleeping Beauty
item.media:title: Sleeping Beauty
item.media:description:
I used this pic as sort of a reference.

upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia…

Here is my take on Sleeping Beauty! I want to draw the "prince's" side of the story...like a female soldier fighting the evil Dragon Maleficent. Maybe I'll do that next...I did some rough sketches of both of them.

item.title: An hour before the ball
item.media:title: An hour before the ball
item.media:description: Here's my take on Cinderella. This was Disney inspired! And yes, he's an elf. Although in this one the cinderella doesn't care about finding romance, but rather he wants to part of the norm, that is why he wants to go to the ball. To be a part of the whole.
item.description: Here's my take on Cinderella. This was Disney inspired! And yes, he's an elf. Although in this one the cinderella doesn't care about finding romance, but rather he wants to part of the norm, that is why he wants to go to the ball. To be a part of the whole.

item.title: Sleeping Death
item.media:title: Sleeping Death
item.media:description:
I've been fixing this thing nonstop...I'm so done OTL. Here is my take on Snow White....I drew a guy instead of a girl. I also didn't want to make his lips super red because I feel that would seem strange? And this is a modern setting since I'm not that good with medieval type clothing. I just wanted to keep this as simple as possible. Enjoy!

I thank you for the early birthday wishes ^^
item.description:
I've been fixing this thing nonstop...I'm so done OTL. Here is my take on Snow White....I drew a guy instead of a girl. I also didn't want to make his lips super red because I feel that would seem strange? And this is a modern setting since I'm not that good with medieval type clothing. I just wanted to keep this as simple as possible. Enjoy!

I thank you for the early birthday wishes ^^

item.description: Birds.The perch or whatever the birds are sitting on is crooked purpose.

item.title: Reunited
item.media:title: Reunited
item.media:description:
A rider and his horse gets separated and fight their way to find each other again. I wish I drew horses more often...long time ago when I was little...all I ever drew were horses. I was initially going to replace the horse with a dragon, but I eventually scrapped that idea.

I'll get to the notes some time this week. Feel free to message me on my tumblr...I usually respond a little quicker there since I like how tumblr's inboxes work. jonn-lock.tumblr.com

UPDATE: So I fixed the eye a bit...hopefully it looks a little better. I thank you for those who have caught it...or else I prbly would've never did OTL There are quite a few anatomy issues...I should really brush up on my anatomy. I wish I had a horse of my own ;_;

There's something I would like to say. When doing this picture I was inspired by How To Train Your Dragon. Hence the description saying that I was going to replace the horse with a dragon. To be honest, this composition and the pose in general have been done a lot of times and I was merely going with the moment of inspiration. I even checked out War Horse since a lot of people were mentioning it and what do you know! Pretty similar...and I didn't even know. www.dreamworksstudios.com/file…
item.description:
A rider and his horse gets separated and fight their way to find each other again. I wish I drew horses more often...long time ago when I was little...all I ever drew were horses. I was initially going to replace the horse with a dragon, but I eventually scrapped that idea.

I'll get to the notes some time this week. Feel free to message me on my tumblr...I usually respond a little quicker there since I like how tumblr's inboxes work. jonn-lock.tumblr.com

UPDATE: So I fixed the eye a bit...hopefully it looks a little better. I thank you for those who have caught it...or else I prbly would've never did OTL There are quite a few anatomy issues...I should really brush up on my anatomy. I wish I had a horse of my own ;_;

To be honest, this composition and the pose in general have been done a lot of times and I was merely going with the moment of inspiration. I even checked out War Horse since a lot of people were mentioning it and what do you know! Pretty similar...and I didn't even know. www.dreamworksstudios.com/file…

item.title: The Blackout
item.media:title: The Blackout
item.media:description: I wasn't sure if I wanted to post this...Ima just do it! So, this is what's going on in the real world. I would totally go insane without my internet life OTL Our world became so reliant on the internet...and technology in general...I feel that's what our apocalypse would be...idk...but, enough of my rambling...enjoy!
item.description: I wasn't sure if I wanted to post this...Ima just do it! So, this is what's going on in the real world. I would totally go insane without my internet life OTL Our world became so reliant on the internet...and technology in general...I feel that's what our apocalypse would be...idk...but, enough of my rambling...enjoy!

item.title: Time for Tea
item.media:title: Time for Tea
item.media:description: Inspired by Alice Du Jardin. This was something I did looooong time ago haha. I was looking at some old art and thought about uploading this. This gloomy weather is making me feel a little down. Yes, Alice has been done many times, but hey...I still enjoyed doing this. ^^
item.description: Inspired by Alice Du Jardin. This was something I did looooong time ago haha. I was looking at some old art and thought about uploading this. This gloomy weather is making me feel a little down. Yes, Alice has been done many times, but hey...I still enjoyed doing this. ^^

item.title: Fox Prince
item.media:title: Fox Prince
item.media:description: The very first Fire Fox I did was originally supposed to be for my fantasy series...I had no intentions of doing the websites and browsers, but when a friend suggested it...I just went for it ^^ But, yeah...I think I might just use the Firefox design for my originals because I like it. I used "The Last of Us" art book as reference because that book is so awesome >< I really love that book, so many good references...I mostly needed it for the skin tones. I used a really good tutorial for the nose...thought I'd try something new instead of my typical nose...I think it's still on the front page of DA if you guys want to check it out ^^ It's in my favorites too. I believe it's by conceptcookie...I learned many ways to do noses at school, but they weren't as helpful...surprisingly.
item.description: The very first Fire Fox I did was originally supposed to be for my fantasy series...I had no intentions of doing the websites and browsers, but when a friend suggested it...I just went for it ^^ But, yeah...I think I might just use the Firefox design for my originals because I like it. I used "The Last of Us" art book as reference because that book is so awesome >< I really love that book, so many good references...I mostly needed it for the skin tones. I used a really good tutorial for the nose...thought I'd try something new instead of my typical nose...I think it's still on the front page of DA if you guys want to check it out ^^ It's in my favorites too. I believe it's by conceptcookie...I learned many ways to do noses at school, but they weren't as helpful...surprisingly.

item.title: Chrome cycle
item.media:title: Chrome cycle
item.media:description: I did my very best to not make it so much like the Light Cycle from Tron. I actually did use real motorcycles for references because when it comes to any motorized vehicles...I need help. I kept on forgetting that I wanted to draw Chrome's motorcycle since he uses that for all his travels. Ima make a page comic about Twitter wanting to ride it, but he can't....it's Chrome's baby.
item.description: I did my very best to not make it so much like the Light Cycle from Tron. I actually did use real motorcycles for references because when it comes to any motorized vehicles...I need help. I kept on forgetting that I wanted to draw Chrome's motorcycle since he uses that for all his travels. Ima make a page comic about Twitter wanting to ride it, but he can't....it's Chrome's baby.

item.media:title: Shocking News?
item.media:description:
FireFox is taunting Chrome. (not meant to be a ship :>)

Firefox: "You honestly think this is shocking news. The government is always up to something."

I’ve been so unproductive…these have only been a distraction. OTL There was a scene prior to this. Here is the link if any are interested.

item.title: Pixiv vs DA
item.media:title: Pixiv vs DA
item.media:description: Here's Pixiv versus Deviantart. A few suggested it and I wanted to do it too >< I wanted to draw them in sort of a battle costumes with their big pens. And I wanted to associate somewhat an oriental style for both. Still thinking of a design for FF...ugh procrastinating like mad. Time to do more fantasy.
item.description: Here's Pixiv versus Deviantart. A few suggested it and I wanted to do it too >< I wanted to draw them in sort of a battle costumes with their big pens. And I wanted to associate somewhat an oriental style for both. Still thinking of a design for FF...ugh procrastinating like mad. Time to do more fantasy.

item.title: Snow Elf
item.media:title: Snow Elf
item.media:description: I finally did something for my fantasy series. I was looking at my "Water" pic I did some time ago and just sort of went with it. I had a more epic pic in my head, but I'm so done. >< I used references for the falcon. The clothes was inspired by Korean traditional attire. He was actually a character I made long ago, he had rabbit ears and wore a hat, but I omitted all those in this one.
item.description: I finally did something for my fantasy series. I was looking at my "Water" pic I did some time ago and just sort of went with it. I had a more epic pic in my head, but I'm so done. >< I used references for the falcon. The clothes was inspired by Korean traditional attire. He was actually a character I made long ago, he had rabbit ears and wore a hat, but I omitted all those in this one.

item.title: Internet Explorer
item.media:title: Internet Explorer
item.media:description:
Here is Internet Explorer! I did this based on the comments I got! I feel a lot of you guys see IE as an old man or fat XD I gave him a more old fashioned look, sort like an old map or drawing. I went with the old man who just realized he's lost. I'm on a drawing rampage...if you can't tell ^^ He's supposed to say, "I think I'm lost." But, he's also lost in his own words.

Edit: Since there were a couple of comments suggesting the younger version ( IE's good old days)...I will do that some time.
There were a couple of comments that was pretty sad about this, but I only did this based on the majority of comments I got, but don't worry, I will be doing a better version for this since I heard IE is revamping their browser. This was the reason why I was so hesitant to do this because I know there are people who still like IE. But, in the end...you can't please everyone.

DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!

item.title: You Tube
item.media:title: You Tube

item.title: Instagram
item.media:title: Instagram
item.media:description:
Here's my take on Instagram! Thank you for the suggestion and ideas ^^ that made it a little easier for me to visualize. The pictures featured is my crappy photos, except for the Instagram logo that is not mine.

I'm sorry I don't have pictures of food ;_; If I have the time, maybe I'll redo this pic because personally, it's not my most favorite work at the moment....also I lack the knowledge of what Instagram is about. Thankfully I was able to pull this out because people were kind to suggest ideas for it, so I thank you for that.

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!

item.title: Chrome
item.media:title: Chrome
item.media:description:
My rendition/parody of Google Chrome. :> A few deviants caught it and I thank you for that :>...the numbers are supposed to be backwards since it's the guy's POV, but I didn't realize that after I posted it, so *facedesk* for me. As for the Fakebook....I wanted you guys to see it, so Ima just leave it. I'm putting it here because I don't want to get numerous comments on how the logic of the number is wrong, so yeah and not to confuse anyone too. ^^ I really need to be more observant when I draw ;_;

UPDATE! So I managed to figure out how to reverse the image, so I fixed it and I also wanted to fix some of the lighting of the screens too, so they're not too prominent :> I wanted to touch up on other parts, like his motorcycle in the back, but I'm done. So...done. I even thought about taking out the screen with the numbers out completely, and I must admit, that didn't look too bad and that meant I could show more of the motorcycle, but either way I think it would've looked okay. As for the Fakebook...I mentioned before...I want you guys to see it, so I didn't touch that. :>

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!
item.description:
My rendition/parody of Google Chrome. :> A few deviants caught it and I thank you for that :>...the numbers are supposed to be backwards since it's the guy's POV, but I didn't realize that after I posted it, so *facedesk* for me. As for the Fakebook....I wanted you guys to see it, so Ima just leave it. I'm putting it here because I don't want to get numerous comments on how the logic of the number is wrong, so yeah and not to confuse anyone too. ^^ I really need to be more observant when I draw ;_;

UPDATE! So I managed to figure out how to reverse the image, so I fixed it and I also wanted to fix some of the lighting of the screens too, so they're not too prominent :> I wanted to touch up on other parts, like his motorcycle in the back, but I'm done. So...done. I even thought about taking out the screen with the numbers out completely, and I must admit, that didn't look too bad and that meant I could show more of the motorcycle, but either way I think it would've looked okay. As for the Fakebook...I mentioned before...I want you guys to see it, so I didn't touch that. :>

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!

item.title: FireFox (Oriental Version)
item.media:title: FireFox (Oriental Version)
item.media:description:
A good friend saw my previous "Fire Fox" posting on my Facebook page and he asked, "What about Chrome and Internet Explorer..." so I've decided to do a more elaborate version of the previous Fire Fox I did, so here is my asian parody of the famous web browser. :>

Firefox is technically a red panda (from what I've heard ^^), so for those who want to cosplay it you can go with the fox design or go with a red panda design, you can replace the ears and the tail as a red panda if you wish. :>

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!
item.description:
A good friend saw my previous "Fire Fox" posting on my Facebook page and he asked, "What about Chrome and Internet Explorer..." so I've decided to do a more elaborate version of the previous Fire Fox I did, so here is my asian parody of the famous web browser. :>

Firefox is technically a red panda (from what I've heard ^^), so for those who want to cosplay it you can go with the fox design or go with a red panda design, you can replace the ears and the tail as a red panda if you wish. :>

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!

item.title: In the Greens
item.media:title: In the Greens
item.media:description: Wanted to something with nature. An elf with his companion. He's supposed to represent the opposite of the elf with the gas mask. While the traditional elves are immersed in nature and elegant architecture...the modern elves are surrounded by industrialization.
item.description: Wanted to something with nature. An elf with his companion. He's supposed to represent the opposite of the elf with the gas mask. While the traditional elves are immersed in nature and elegant architecture...the modern elves are surrounded by industrialization.

item.title: the Crimson Flower
item.media:title: the Crimson Flower
item.media:description: This was inspired by The Last of Us. Believe in the Crimson Flower. They're pretty much a group who wishes to do away with the traditional elvish ways and would like to live a life of liberty and trust. Haha hopefully you can tell he's an elf. I've been having major brain farts lately and couldn't really do much. This is also part of my fantasy series.
item.description: This was inspired by The Last of Us. Believe in the Crimson Flower. They're pretty much a group who wishes to do away with the traditional elvish ways and would like to live a life of liberty and trust. Haha hopefully you can tell he's an elf. I've been having major brain farts lately and couldn't really do much. This is also part of my fantasy series.

item.title: Blues
item.media:title: Blues
item.media:description: Another random OC. Haha I wanted to take a little break from schoolboys, but they'll be back. :> I thought I'd draw a series of fantasy boys
item.description: Another random OC. Haha I wanted to take a little break from schoolboys, but they'll be back. :> I thought I'd draw a series of fantasy boys

item.title: Joel and Ellie
item.media:title: Joel and Ellie
item.media:description: I tried my best ;v; I really wanted to draw Joel and Ellie together in one pic, but couldn't think of a good composition or scene. I eventually chose a scene (towards the end of the game) where Ellie gives Joel a photo of his daughter and him. :> I did my best huhuhuhu.. I was going to do it in color, but I thought BW looked good. I'll prbly fix it and touch it up a bit more later. -_-
item.description: I tried my best ;v; I really wanted to draw Joel and Ellie together in one pic, but couldn't think of a good composition or scene. I eventually chose a scene (towards the end of the game) where Ellie gives Joel a photo of his daughter and him. :> I did my best huhuhuhu.. I was going to do it in color, but I thought BW looked good. I'll prbly fix it and touch it up a bit more later. -_-

item.title: Camera Shy
item.media:title: Camera Shy
item.media:description: The same guy from the classroom scene. :> I might associate him with the guy on the bicycle. Still don't have names for them. -_- But, yeah...He loves to draw and aspires to be an art teacher someday.
item.description: The same guy from the classroom scene. :> I might associate him with the guy on the bicycle. Still don't have names for them. -_- But, yeah...He loves to draw and aspires to be an art teacher someday.

item.title: The Cat Pack
item.media:title: The Cat Pack
item.media:description: I finally drew all of them together, although I had other scenes in mind...I just took a simpler concept. My original CAT pack illustration didn't include Mitchell, so I wanted to put him in. And I also changed the purple hair guy;s design too. The only people I have names for is Mitchell and Cameron ( blue headphones ). The other's will have to wait. OTL
item.description: I finally drew all of them together, although I had other scenes in mind...I just took a simpler concept. My original CAT pack illustration didn't include Mitchell, so I wanted to put him in. And I also changed the purple hair guy;s design too. The only people I have names for is Mitchell and Cameron ( blue headphones ). The other's will have to wait. OTL

item.title: Paper Boy
item.media:title: Paper Boy
item.media:description: This is part of my future one-shot color story that I plan on doing. I really wanted to start on it (at least on the roughs), but due to other obligations and commitments I must wait OTL. I also have designs for Paper Girl, but I won't be showing her until later. This is Mitchell when he's older, maybe high schoolish.
item.description: This is part of my future one-shot color story that I plan on doing. I really wanted to start on it (at least on the roughs), but due to other obligations and commitments I must wait OTL. I also have designs for Paper Girl, but I won't be showing her until later. item.title: Ellie
item.media:title: Ellie
item.media:description: Ellie from The Last of Us. I'm not really into the post-apocalyptic zombie games, but I really want to play this game. It looks so good. It's my first time drawing these types of characters, so it was a fun experience.
item.description: Ellie from The Last of Us. I'm not really into the post-apocalyptic zombie games, but I really want to play this game. It looks so good. It's my first time drawing these types of characters, so it was a fun experience.
